org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRRecti

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRRecti
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class OVRRecti
extends Struct
    A 2D rectangle with a position and size. All components are integers.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • OVRRecti

        public OVRRecti(long struct)
        Creates a OVRRecti instance at the specified memory address.

      • OVRRecti

        public OVRRecti(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a OVRRecti instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
